title: On the Upsilon invariant in grid homology
abstract:
The Upsilon invariant is a concordance invariant in knot Floer homology.
F\"{o}ldv\'{a}ri reconstructed the Upsilon invariant using grid homology. We
prove that the Upsilon invariant in knot Floer homology and one in grid
homology are equivalent. Furthermore, we show some properties of the Upsilon
invariant in the framework of grid homology.
